Login from a teamspeak client using the following information.

_Engines_Builder(logs_container)

start.content:
#!/bin/sh
. /home/engines/functions/trap.sh

PID_FILE=/home/engines/run/ts3server.pid

export PID_FILE

export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=".:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH"
cd /home/app


 
if test -f ./ts.ini
 then
  if ! test -h /home/app/ts3server.sqlitedb
   then
    mkdir /home/fs/persistent/db/
    mv /home/app/ts3server.sqlitedb /home/fs/persistent/db/
    ln -s /home/fs/persistent/db/ts3server.sqlitedb /home/app/
  fi
  ./ts3server_minimal_runscript.sh initfile=./ts.ini &
else
  ./ts3server_minimal_runscript.sh clear_database=1 create_default_virtualserver=1 logpath=/var/log createinifile=1  &
  mv ts3server.ini ts.ini
fi
#/home/app/ts3server &
pid=$!
echo $pid > $PID_FILE
sleep 10
startup_complete
wait $pid
r=$?
shutdown_complete
echo exit $?
